Message:
When I was young,
I lived in a village
out on the borderlands.

It was a dull sort of place,
nothing much to it.

A childhood spent between
tiring farm chores and
dreadful boredom.

So when I heard news that knights
from the Church of Longinus
would be paying us a visit,

As a child, I fantasized about
joining those holy knights on
their Witch Hunts.

“Hey Ma, you think they’ll
tell me ’bout their adventures?”

Seeing me restless and excited,
my mother simply smiled.
